name: PixelBucks - ???
description:
Welcome to the first official release of PixelBucks! This first collection of PixelBucks will feature the cryptocurrency ETH and its creator, Vitalik Buterin. The only PixelBuck in this collection that will feature the face of Vitalik in the center of it is the legendary 1 Billion Buck. The rest will have the ETH logo instead, making this single PixelBuck especially rare and one-of-a-kind! All future collections will follow this same format.

There will be a total of 1260 pieces in each PixelBucks collection, broken down in the following manner:

- 5 Tiers:
     T1 = GREEN (common)
     T2 = RED (uncommon)
     T3 = BLUE (rare)
     T4 = PURPLE (epic)
     T5 = GOLD (legendary)

- 9 Unique PixelBucks: 1 Buck, 10 Bucks, 100 Bucks, 1,000 Bucks, 10,000 Bucks, 100,000 Bucks, 1,000,000 Bucks, 100,000,000 Bucks, and 1,000,000,000 Bucks

- PixelBucks Distribution [T5, T4, T3, T2, T1]
	1 Bucks (500)
		[25, 50, 100, 125, 200]
	10 Bucks (300)
		[15, 30, 60, 75, 120]
	100 Bucks (200)
		[10, 20, 40, 50, 80]
	1k Bucks (100)
		[5, 10, 20, 25, 40]
	10k Bucks (75)
		[4, 8, 16, 20, 27]
	100k Bucks (40)
		[3, 4, 8, 10, 15]
	1M Bucks (25)
		[1, 2, 4, 7, 11]
	100M Bucks (15)
		[1, 2, 3, 4, 5}
	1B Bucks (5)
		[1, 1, 1, 1, 1]

To get your PixelBucks, follow these simple steps:

1) Hit the buy button below to order a random PixelBuck.
2) Send it to this burner address: tz1hs6monPpcxheAGbXdvivdktTfFcZX7Bha
3) Allow up to 48 hours for our team to send back the minted version of your new PixelBuck!
4) Pray to the Pixel Gods that you get a high tier PixelBuck!
5) Tell all your friends in the NFT community about us to help spread the word! <3

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BucksPixel
Discord: COMING SOON!!! (check twitter for updates)

Thank you to everyone who supports, and lastly, may the odds be ever in your favor!
